title: Where do you report boosters?
body: My friends and I recently encountered a team of boosters in ranked. We have evidence to prove that they were boosting and it is particularly of concern as more than one of us were in promos when we found them. Where should I go to make sure that they are discovered by riot?

replies.body:
If by "boosting" you mean "playing on someone else's account", then you can submit your 'evidence' in a [Support Ticket here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Just put it under **I have a question > Game & Features > General Questions** category.

If by "boosting" you mean, "High tier player on a low tier smurf premade with low tier friends", that isn't a punishable offense.
The first one, yes thank you
